Key Match Events: KL Rahul departed for 9 from 14 deliveries in Perth vs South Africa
Rohit Sharma was dismissed by a sharp bouncer from Lungi Ngidi
Pre-Game Insights: The India team management was asked on the eve of the match against South Africa in Perth whether they were thinking of replacing KL Rahul with Rishabh Pant
Post-Match Reflections: KL Rahul looked distraught as he slammed his bat on the ground after getting out for 9 from 14 deliveries
The pressure is now growing on the vice-captain who has looked completely out of rhythm in the World Cup campaign in Australia
Miscellaneous Highlights: KL Rahul has played 27 innings in the powerplay in the last 2 years and averages less than 30 and has a strike rate of less than 120
